formElement.label: Description:
formElement.documentation: You can supply a text description only for your reference. Commander does not use this information.

formElement.label: Login As:
formElement.documentation: Provide the user name and password that Commander uses to communicate with the StarTeam server.

formElement.label: EndPoint:
formElement.documentation: The EndPoint is the port used by the StarTeam server. If not provided, use default port 1024.

formElement.label: Hostname:
formElement.documentation: Specifies the hostname of the StarTeam server. (Required)

formElement.label: Password file:
formElement.documentation: Specifies the path of the file where the password is stored.
If checked, the StarTeam server takes the file as an encrypted file.
formElement.label: Password file is encrypted:
